summary: Use the grain mill to grind various items into dust.
descriptionHtml:
Grind Stuff (v0.5) & Grind Stuff Hearthfire Edition (v0.5)
====================================================
by Axhoff


Use the grain mills to grind ingredients and other items into salts and powders.

The Hearthfire Edition removes modifications made to the Grain Mill; these are now handled by the Hearthfire DLC.

What it does:
=============
This mod adds several recipes to the manual operated grain mills that can be found near some farms (Rorikstead has 2, Ivarstead 1 and I know of one near Riften)
Now you can grind human and troll skulls into bonemeal and mammoth tusks into powdered mammoth tusks.

You can now also produce in small and large batches. For example: If you have 5 or more taproots in your inventory you can now produce 5 spriggan sap with one click.

-----------------------------------
True alchemists get more with less:
-----------------------------------
With large batches an alchemist with the Purity perk uses less materials than someone without, especially when creating void salts.

Example large batch:
Without Purity perk: 10 Taproot -> 10 Spriggan sap

With Purity perk: 8 Taproot -> 10 Spriggan sap

Got barrels full of Taproot or sacks filled with wheat? Be more efficient with large batches, get that Purity perk!


Large batches not large enough? Are you an alchemist AND hoarder? Are Spriggans and Mammoths extinct from you hunting them down? Well then... it\'s time to go industrial!
Industrial batches are only available to alchemists with a filled perk tree** (and lots of items/ingredients).


See version history for the recipes.


Updating?:
==========
Have version 0.4 installed? Just overwrite it with the new version.


Version History:
================
0.5 / 0.5 HE

-The three windmills near Whiterun (Pelagia, Chillfurrow and Battleborn farm) can now be used the same way as the manual operated ones.

Hearthfire Edition only:
-Added a Butter Churn to each of the farms.

----------
0.4.1 HE

Added small and large batch for Flour (Food item). Hearthfire Edition only.
small batch: 15 wheat -> 5 flour
large batch: 27 wheat -> 10 flour

----
0.4

[normal recipes, always visible in menu]

(Human) Skull -> 2 Bone Meal
Troll Skull -> 4 Bone Meal
Mammoth Tusk -> 4 Powdered Mammoth Tusk
2 Wheat -> 1 Flour
1 Taproot -> 1 Spriggan Sap
2 Icewraith Teeth + 2 Salt piles -> 1 Frost Salts
Black Soul Gem (empty) + Vampire dust + Salt pile -> 2 Void Salts
2 Garnet + 3 Salt pile -> 3 Fire Salts

[small batch, only visible when the minimum amounts of items required are in the inventory]

3 (Human) Skull -> 6 Bone Meal
3 Troll Skull -> 12 Bone Meal
3 Mammoth Tusk -> 12 Powdered Mammoth Tusk
10 Wheat -> 5 Flour
5 Taproot -> 5 Spriggan Sap
8 Icewraith Teeth + 8 Salt piles -> 4 Frost Salts
3 Black Soul Gem (empty) + 3 Vampire dust + 3 Salt pile -> 6 Void Salts
6 Garnet + 9 Salt pile -> 9 Fire Salts

[large batch, NO Purity perk, only visible when the minimum amounts of items required are in the inventory]

6 (Human) Skull -> 12 Bone Meal
5 Troll Skull -> 20 Bone Meal
5 Mammoth Tusk -> 20 Powdered Mammoth Tusk
20 Wheat -> 10 Flour
10 Taproot -> 10 Spriggan Sap
16 Icewraith Teeth + 16 Salt piles -> 8 Frost Salts
6 Black Soul Gem (empty) + 6 Vampire dust + 6 Salt pile -> 12 Void Salts
10 Garnet + 15 Salt pile -> 15 Fire Salts

[large batch, WITH Purity perk, only visible when the minimum amounts of items required are in the inventory]

5 (Human) Skull -> 12 Bone Meal
4 Troll Skull -> 20 Bone Meal
4 Mammoth Tusk -> 20 Powdered Mammoth Tusk
16 Wheat -> 10 Flour
8 Taproot -> 10 Spriggan Sap
14 Icewraith Teeth + 14 Salt piles -> 8 Frost Salts
4 Black Soul Gem (empty) + 5 Vampire dust + 5 Salt pile -> 12 Void Salts
8 Garnet + 12 Salt pile -> 15 Fire Salts

[industrial batch, only visible with full alchemy perk tree** AND at least 20 of the item(s) required for the recipe present in his/her inventory]

46 (Human) Skull -> 120 Bone Meal
34 Troll Skull -> 200 Bone Meal
32 Mammoth Tusk -> 200 Powdered Mammoth Tusk
140 Wheat -> 100 Flour
60 Taproot -> 100 Spriggan Sap
100 Icewraith Teeth + 120 Salt piles -> 80 Frost Salts
30 Black Soul Gem (empty) + 40 Vampire dust + 50 Salt pile -> 120 Void Salts
60 Garnet + 100 Salt pile -> 150 Fire Salts


0.3 	Except for Flour other recipes won\'t appear at the mill unless you have the nessesary ingredients.

	Added 2 new recipes:
	Black Soul Gem (empty) + Vampire dust + Salt pile -> 2 Void Salts
	2 Garnet + 3 Salt pile -> 3 Fire Salts
	
	Reduced Wheat needed for Flour (the ingredient) to 2 Wheat.

0.2 Adds 3 new recipes and 1 new ingredient: Flour (uses the Bone Meal model).
	3 Wheat -> 1 Flour
	1 Taproot -> 1 Spriggan Sap ;use the mill as a Juicer :)
	2 Icewraith Teeth + 2 Salt piles -> 1 Frost Salts

0.1 Initial release. 3 Recipes: 
	(Human) Skull -> 2 Bone Meal
	Troll Skull -> 4 Bone Meal
	Mammoth Tusk -> 4 Powdered Mammoth Tusk


**| Filled perk tree may not be entirely accurate. You\'ll need to maximize Alchemy (5/5), Experimenter(3/3) and have Green Thumb and Purity perk activated.


Featured Video:
==============
By SaioTV

[youtube]c-4Higj35Bw[/youtube]

Locations grain mills:
===================
Dragonbridge
Ivarstead
Merryfair Farm (Riften)
Rorikstead (has 2)
Falkreath
Druadach Redoubt (inside the cave)


Future updates ?:
-----------------------
Only if I, or someone else, gets the animation going for longer than one rotation. Will possibly add some more recipes. If you got suggestions leave \'m in the comments.
author: Axhoff
